algorithm_technique: Iterate through numbers, maintaining prefix sum and ORing with current number and prefix sum.
Iterate through bits, count numbers with that bit set and numbers whose prefix sum has that bit set.
problem_summary_simple: Find the bitwise OR of all possible sums of subsequences.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates the bitwise OR of all subsequence sums by leveraging properties of prefix sums and bitwise operations.
key_insights: The key insight is that the OR of all subsequence sums is equivalent to the OR of all numbers and their prefix sums.
This approach avoids generating all subsequences, which would be computationally expensive.
This solution checks each bit position independently.
If any subsequence sum can have a specific bit set, that bit will be set in the final result.
